trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of data bindings for a control.
Simple data binding is accomplished by adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.

Any object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DataBindings%2A> property.
For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> contains standard collection methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Remove%2A>.
To get the control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection> belongs to, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection"></xref> class with the specified bindable control.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent"></xref> the binding collection belongs to.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to the collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> created by this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when the change is complete.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to add.
The binding is null.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> does not specify a valid column of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource"></xref>.
Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> using the specified control property name, data source, and data member, and adds it to the collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> created by this overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method is set to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property.
Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event to occur.
The name of the control property to bind.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the data source.
The property or list to bind to.
The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
The binding is `null`.
The dataMember doesn't specify a valid member of the dataSource.
Creates a binding with the specified control property name, data source, data member, and information about whether formatting is enabled, and adds the binding to the collection.
The name of the control property to bind.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data source.
The property or list to bind to.
`true` to format the displayed data; otherwise, `false`
The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
The property given by propertyName does not exist on the control.
-or-
The property given is a read-only property.
If formatting is disabled and the propertyName is neither a valid property of a control nor an empty string ("").

Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, and adding the binding to the collection.
Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
The name of the control property to bind.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data source.
The property or list to bind to.
`true` to format the displayed data; otherwise, `false`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref> values.
The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
The property given by propertyName does not exist on the control or is read-only.
-or-
The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
-or-
The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.

Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, setting the property to the specified value when <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> is returned from the data source, and adding the binding to the collection.
Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
The name of the control property to bind.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data source.
The property or list to bind to.
`true` to format the displayed data; otherwise, `false`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref> values.
When the data source has this value, the bound property is set to <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>.
The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>
The property given by propertyName does not exist on the control or is read-only.
-or-
The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
-or-
The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.

Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting with the specified format string, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, setting the property to the specified value when <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> is returned from the data source, and adding the binding to the collection.
Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
The name of the control property to bind.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data source.
The property or list to bind to.
`true` to format the displayed data; otherwise, `false`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref> values.
When the data source has this value, the bound property is set to <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>.
One or more format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed.
The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>
The property given by propertyName does not exist on the control or is read-only.
-or-
The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
-or-
The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.

Creates a binding that binds the specified control property to the specified data member of the specified data source, optionally enabling formatting with the specified format string, propagating values to the data source based on the specified update setting, setting the property to the specified value when <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> is returned from the data source, setting the specified format provider, and adding the binding to the collection.
Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Add%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
The name of the control property to bind.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data source.
The property or list to bind to.
`true` to format the displayed data; otherwise, `false`.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref> values.
When the data source has this value, the bound property is set to <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>.
One or more format specifier characters that indicate how a value is to be displayed
An implementation of <xref href="System.IFormatProvider"></xref> to override default formatting behavior.
The newly created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>.
The property given by propertyName does not exist on the control or is read-only.
-or-
The specified data member does not exist on the data source.
-or-
The data source, data member, or control property specified are associated with another binding in the collection.
Adds a binding to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to add.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent"></xref> the binding collection belongs to.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.BindableComponent%2A> property returns the same object as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Control%2A> property.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent"></xref> the binding collection belongs to.
Clears the collection of any bindings.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs when the collection is cleared.
Clears the bindings in the collection.
Gets the control that the collection belongs to.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that the collection belongs to.
Gets or sets the default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> in the collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.DefaultDataSourceUpdateMode%2A> property is used in cases where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> without a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSourceUpdateMode%2A> specified is added to the collection.
The default value for Windows Forms controls is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode.OnValidation>
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataSourceUpdateMode"></xref> values.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> specified by the control's property name.
If the specified property does not match a binding in the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection.Item%2A> returns `null`.
The name of the property on the data-bound control.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> that binds the specified control property to a data source.
Deletes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to remove.
The binding is `null`.
Deletes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> at the specified index.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the removal succeeds.
The zero-based index of the item to remove.
The index value is less than 0, or it is greater than the number of bindings in the collection.
Removes the specified binding from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> to remove from the collection.
The binding belongs to another <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection"></xref>.
